sentences.en: A number of other techniques are now being used by psychologists in the rehabilitation of young offenders.
sentences.cn: 一些别的技术现正被心理学家们用于年轻罪犯的复原。

sentences.en: Strong government support has made adaptive rehabilitation a reality in Boston.
sentences.cn: 政府的大力支持使适应性康复在波士顿成为现实。

sentences.en: On campus, he quickly found that beyond ordinary counselling, the university had no services for students who were undergoing physical rehabilitation and suffering from depression like him.
sentences.cn: 在学校里，他很快发现，除了普通的心理咨询，学校没有为那些像他一样正在进行身体康复和患有抑郁症的学生提供任何服务。
